description:
Because there aren’t always trees where you need them. This pole lets you set up a tarp or wing shelter where and however you like.

  • Made of strong, light 6061 aircraft grade aluminum
  • Shock-corded for easy assembly
  • Top section has push-button telescopic height adjustment
  • 1.2m size adjusts from 119–140cm. Sold as a pair
  • 1.5m size adjusts from 140–167cm. Sold individually
  • 2.4m size adjusts from 208–259cm. Sold individually
name: MSR Adjustable Pole
